component.name: Pluma
component.summary: A Text Editor for the MATE desktop environment

description.p: Pluma is a small, but powerful text editor designed specifically for the MATE desktop. It has most standard text editor functions and fully supports international text in Unicode. Advanced features include syntax highlighting and automatic indentation of source code, printing and editing of multiple documents in one window.
Pluma is extensible through a plugin system, which currently includes support for spell checking, comparing files, viewing CVS ChangeLogs, and adjusting indentation levels.
